thread.title: Thom Slagle

author: Thom Slagle
title: Thom Slagle
text:
Although finding someone who would convert an LP gas grill to an existing natural gas hookup was difficult, after calling the recommended professionals, I did find an excellent plumber to provide the services.
The only criticism I have is that several of the recommended plumbers did not perform the service I needed, so I spent an inordinate amount of time reciting my needs to no avail. I would suggest that something as specialized as a LP gas grill conversion to natural gas be verified and highlighted in the professional's profile. It would make Home Advisor even better than it already is!
